short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets your preferred currency on Google Flights. Currency will no longer be location-based.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Flights sets your currency based on your location.

That's annoying if you're not familiar with the local currency.

This extension lets you select your preferred currency and makes Google Flights always use that currency.

Note: Currently just sets to USD. Soon you will be able to select any available currency
